title: FS: T222 McInnis PSA 4.5; T201 Baker / Downie PSA 6
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: FS: T222 McInnis PSA 4.5; T201 Baker / Downie PSA 6
posts.post_content:
Hi - selling the two pictured cards:

1914 T222 Stuffy McInnis PSA 4.5 - total PSA pop of 17, with only 2 5’s and a 6 higher than this one.  Tough to find T222’s this nice. $325

1911 T201 Baker / Downie PSA 6 - nice card, case has a very small surface spider crack near the top of the card.  Nothing goes through to impact the card in any way. $160

Happy to email along bigger scans if you would like - just let me know an email address and I can send right along to you.

PayPal F/F preferred but happy to accept any other payment form - let me know any questions - thanks for looking!

Scott
